body: Anyone know how to delete this account and create a new one? If so, please help!
body_tagged: Anyone know how to delete this account and create a new one? If so, please help!
title: New Accout Plz

replies.body: Once you've bought your Minecraft account you can't just ditch it and get a new one for free... unless you pay of course.
replies.body_tagged: Once you've bought your Minecraft account you can't just ditch it and get a new one for free... unless you pay of course.

replies.body: I see... Well, then. Goodbye Auratixx
replies.body_tagged: I see... Well, then. Goodbye Auratixx

replies.body:
If you wanted to delete this account you probably would have to contact Mojang's support team.

To create a brand new account, you're gonna have to buy one.
replies.body_tagged:
If you wanted to delete this account you probably would have to contact Mojang's support team.

replies.body: His ban got appealed since he changed it. He should still have access to the server, it says he was last seen 2 hours ago?
